Body: My S3's screen got smashed a few months ago- and after replacing the screen twice, I bought the S5; and kept the old phone.For some reason, I just remembered about it and wanted to try and restore all the lost photos, chats etc. Can anyone help me out and tell me what to do? P.s. I assume the touch-screen doesn't work either, since there isn't a haptic sound when I touch it, BUT, I don't think there is an internal damage since the phone is charging and is making sound when turned on\off.
Title: Enable usb debugging on a non-functioning screen (S3)

history.Text: My S3's screen got smashed a few months ago- and after replacing the screen twice, I bought the S5; and kept the old phone.For some reason, I just remembered about it and wanted to try and restore all the lost photos, chats etc. Can anyone help me out and tell me what to do? P.s. I assume the touch-screen doesn't work either, since there isn't a haptic sound when I touch it, BUT, I don't think there is an internal damage since the phone is charging and is making sound when turned on\off.
